statements: SELECT * FROM public_opinion_surveys;
SELECT survey_id, survey_name, survey_topic FROM public_opinion_surveys WHERE respondent_age > 30;
SELECT survey_name, survey_topic, survey_date FROM public_opinion_surveys WHERE survey_topic = 'Politics';
SELECT respondent_age, respondent_gender, response FROM public_opinion_surveys WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_id, respondent_age, respondent_gender FROM public_opinion_surveys ORDER BY respondent_age DESC, survey_id ASC;
SELECT survey_name, respondent_age, respondent_gender FROM public_opinion_surveys WHERE respondent_gender='Male'
SELECT survey_topic, survey_date FROM public_opinion_surveys WHERE respondent_age > 30 ORDER BY survey_date DESC
SELECT survey_name, response FROM public_opinion_surveys WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_surveys WHERE survey_topic='Politics' AND respondent_gender='Female' ORDER BY respondent_age ASC
SELECT survey_name, response FROM public_opinion_surveys WHERE survey_topic='Healthcare' AND response LIKE '%positive%'
SELECT * FROM Surveys;
SELECT survey_topic, survey_date FROM Surveys WHERE survey_id = 101;
SELECT survey_topic, total_responses FROM Surveys ORDER BY total_responses DESC;
SELECT respondent_name, response_option FROM PollResults WHERE survey_id = 201 ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT survey_topic, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM Surveys GROUP BY survey_topic;
SELECT survey_topic, total_responses FROM Surveys WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PollResults WHERE response_option = 'Agree' ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(*) AS total_results FROM PollResults GROUP BY survey_id HAVING total_results > 10;
SELECT survey_topic, response_option, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM Surveys INNER JOIN PollResults ON Surveys.survey_id = PollResults.survey_id GROUP BY survey_topic, response_option;
SELECT respondent_name, response_option FROM PollResults WHERE survey_id = 1 AND response_option IN ('Agree', 'Strongly Agree') ORDER BY respondent_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM surveys;
SELECT survey_name, survey_date FROM surveys WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM participants WHERE participant_age >= 25;
SELECT survey_name, participant_name, question, answer FROM surveys s, participants p, responses r WHERE s.survey_id = r.survey_id AND p.participant_id = r.participant_id;
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM responses GROUP BY survey_id ORDER BY total_responses DESC;
SELECT * FROM surveys ORDER BY survey_date ASC;
SELECT survey_name, survey_result FROM surveys WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM participants WHERE participant_gender = 'Female';

SELECT survey_name, participant_name, question, answer FROM surveys s JOIN responses r ON s.survey_id = r.survey_id JOIN participants p ON r.participant_id = p.participant_id ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_surveys FROM surveys;
SELECT * FROM SurveyParticipants;
SELECT participant_name, age FROM SurveyParticipants WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT question_text, question_category FROM SurveyQuestions WHERE question_category='Feedback' ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT participant_name, location FROM SurveyParticipants WHERE age > 30 AND gender='Female';
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SurveyParticipants;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM SurveyParticipants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT participant_name, age, location FROM SurveyParticipants WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;

SELECT response_id, participant_name, question_text, response_text FROM SurveyResponses JOIN SurveyParticipants ON SurveyResponses.participant_id = SurveyParticipants.participant_id JOIN SurveyQuestions ON SurveyResponses.question_id = SurveyQuestions.question_id;

SELECT question_text, COUNT(response_id) AS response_count FROM SurveyResponses JOIN SurveyQuestions ON SurveyResponses.question_id = SurveyQuestions.question_id GROUP BY question_text ORDER BY response_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Surveys;
SELECT survey_id, question, survey_date FROM Surveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM Responses WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender, email FROM Participants WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT poll_question, poll_date FROM Polls WHERE poll_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Surveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT question, question_type FROM Surveys WHERE survey_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Responses JOIN Participants ON Responses.participant_id = Participants.participant_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM Participants WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT poll_date, poll_question, poll_options FROM Polls ORDER BY poll_date ASC;
